TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ActiveDirectorySchemaClass extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: The class represents a schema class definition that is contained in the schema partition.

Docs.summary: Gets an object in the Active Directory Domain Services schema partition that matches a given directory context and name.
Docs.returns: An object for the schema class that was found. Returns if the class was not found.
Docs.exception: The object was not found.
